1112496|@actions/core>undici.reason: Vulnerability in transitive dependency undici via @actions/core. Application uses native browser fetch() API, not Node.js fetch, so vulnerable code path is not executed at runtime. This is a dev dependency used by semantic-release tooling only.

1112496|@actions/http-client>undici.reason: Vulnerability in transitive dependency undici via @actions/http-client. Application uses native browser fetch() API, not Node.js fetch, so vulnerable code path is not executed at runtime. @actions/http-client is not imported in source code (verified by scripts/verify-unused-deps.js).

1112659|npm>tar.reason: Vulnerability in tar package (GHSA-34x7-hfp2-rc4v) via npm transitive dependency. This affects @semantic-release/npm which uses npm as a dependency. tar is only used during CI/CD package installation and release processes, not at runtime. The application does not use tar directly and this vulnerability does not affect production builds or runtime execution.

semantic-release|@semantic-release/commi.reason: Vulnerability flagged in semantic-release and plugins. These are dev dependencies used only in CI/CD for automated releases.
